title: Authors and Citation
text: Al Ali H (2022). vcfqc: Package (One Line, Title Case). R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {vcfqc: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {Hatoon {Al Ali}},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: vcfqc tool can visualize distribution quality annotation values table summary VCF files. visualization can help setting threshhold values hard-filtering.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install latest version vcfqc copying following commands R console:

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: example quality depth (QD) annotation distribution
code: library(vcfqc) QD(system.file("extdata", "HG001_GRCh38.table", package = "vcfqc")) #> All variants are annotated with QD score #>  #>    Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max.  #>    0.43   15.41   20.42   21.21   28.66   42.71  #>  #> Number of variants with a QD score lower than 2: 41225 #>  #> Expected plot:  #> __________________________________________________________ #> There are two peaks where the majority of variants are (around QD = 12 and QD = 32).  #> These two peaks correspond to variants that are mostly observed in heterozygous (het) versus mostly homozygous-variant (hom-var) states, respectively, in the called samples.  #> This is because hom-var samples contribute twice as many reads supporting the variant than do het variants.  #> We also see, to the left of the distribution, a 'shoulder' of variants with QD hovering between 0 and 5.

title: Plot FisherStrand (FS) — FS
text: Phred-scaled probability strand bias site. Strand Bias tells us whether alternate allele seen less often forward reverse strand reference allele. little strand bias site, FS value close 0

title: Plot FisherStrand (FS) — FS
text: f VCF input file n Threshold value (optional), default recommended GATK value.

title: Plot FisherStrand (FS) — FS
text: plot QD score frequency table summary number variants falling outside threshold

title: Plot Mapping Quality (MQ) — MQ
text: root mean square mapping quality reads site. Instead average mapping quality site, annotation gives square root average squares mapping qualities site. meant include standard deviation mapping qualities. Including standard deviation allows us include variation dataset. low standard deviation means values close mean, whereas high standard deviation means values far mean.mapping qualities good site, MQ around 60.

title: Plot Mapping Quality (MQ) — MQ
text: f VCF input file n Threshold value (optional), default recommended GATK value.

title: Plot Mapping Quality (MQ) — MQ
text: plot MQ score frequency table summary number variants falling outside threshold

title: Plot MappingQualityRankSumTest (MQRankSum) — MQRankSum
text: u-based z-approximation Rank Sum Test mapping qualities. compares mapping qualities reads supporting reference allele alternate allele. positive value means mapping qualities reads supporting alternate allele higher supporting reference allele; negative value indicates mapping qualities reference allele higher supporting alternate allele. value close zero best indicates little difference mapping qualities.

title: Plot MappingQualityRankSumTest (MQRankSum) — MQRankSum
text: f VCF input file n Threshold value (optional), default recommended GATK value.

title: Plot MappingQualityRankSumTest (MQRankSum) — MQRankSum
text: plot MQRankSum score frequency table summary number variants falling outside threshold

title: Plot Quality by Depth (QD) — QD
text: variant confidence (QUAL field) divided unfiltered depth non-hom-ref samples. annotation intended normalize variant quality order avoid inflation caused deep coverage. filtering purposes better use QD either QUAL DP directly. generic filtering recommendation QD filter variants QD 2.

title: Plot Quality by Depth (QD) — QD
text: f VCF input file n Threshold value (optional), default recommended GATK value.

title: Plot Quality by Depth (QD) — QD
text: plot QD score frequency table summary number variants falling outside threshold

title: Plot ReadPosRankSumTest (ReadPosRankSum) — ReadPosRankSum
text: u-based z-approximation Rank Sum Test site position within reads. compares whether positions reference alternate alleles different within reads. Seeing allele near ends reads indicative error, sequencers tend make errors. negative value indicates alternate allele found ends reads often reference allele; positive value indicates reference allele found ends reads often alternate allele. value close zero best indicates little difference positions reference alternate alleles reads.

title: Plot ReadPosRankSumTest (ReadPosRankSum) — ReadPosRankSum
text: f VCF input file n Threshold value (optional), default recommended GATK value.

title: Plot ReadPosRankSumTest (ReadPosRankSum) — ReadPosRankSum
text: plot ReadPosRankSum score frequency table summary number variants falling outside threshold

title: Plot StrandOddsRAtio (SOR) — SOR
text: another way estimate strand bias using test similar symmetric odds ratio test. SOR created FS tends penalize variants occur ends exons. Reads ends exons tend covered reads one direction FS gives variants bad score. SOR take account ratios reads cover alleles.

title: Plot StrandOddsRAtio (SOR) — SOR
text: f file n threshold

title: Plot StrandOddsRAtio (SOR) — SOR
text: plot SOR score frequency table summary number variants falling outside threshold

title: Dataset HG001_GRCh38 — extdata/HG001_GRCh38.table
text: dataset containing GATK quality annotations VCF file generated using GATK Germline short variant discovery pipeline HG001 reference sample genome bottle project. dataset used example display package's functions

title: Dataset HG001_GRCh38 — extdata/HG001_GRCh38.table
text: data frame 4786095 rows 12 variables: CHROM Chromosome POS Position REF Referenece ALT Alternative FILTER VQSR pass QUAL Quality QD QualByDepth FS FisherStrand SOR StrandOddsRatio MQ RMSMappingQuality MQRankSum MappingQualityRankSumTest ReadPosRankSum ReadPosRankSumTest
